benchmark_details.name: Beyond the Hype: Benchmarking LLM-Evolved Heuristics for Bin Packing
benchmark_details.overview: This paper conducts the first rigorous benchmarking study of new LLM-generated heuristics for bin packing, comparing them to established heuristics across a large suite of benchmark instances to evaluate their generalization capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously benchmark LLM-generated heuristics against established heuristics in the bin packing domain and to evaluate their performance across diverse datasets.

data.source: Datasets were obtained from literature including BPPLib and other domains, with instances drawn from various distributions.
data.annotation: Items were randomly shuffled for online packing scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the performance of each heuristic across the benchmark datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Lower Average Excess Bins indicates better packing efficiency among heuristics.
methodology.baseline_results: Established hand-designed heuristics (e.g., Best-Fit, First-Fit) were used as baselines.
methodology.validation: Validation through extensive comparisons across a broad suite of benchmark instances.
